text:
JAMES Corden has revealed the awkward reason he almost interrupted the royal wedding vows.

The Late Late Show host attended the nuptials between Prince Harry and Meghan Markle on Saturday at Windsor Castle with his wife Julia, reports The Sun.

He also acted as a compere at the couple’s reception later that day, and having returned to LA, Corden opened up about his experience on Monday night’s show.

While he said it had been “one of the most beautiful ceremonies I’ve ever been to”, he revealed there was one part of it that he really struggled with.

media_camera James Corden explains why he almost interrupted the royal wedding. Picture: CBS

He said: “Here’s the thing, the worst part of the ceremony for me was there was flowers everywhere, the most beautiful flowers you’ve ever seen.

“I get quite bad allergies if I’m in close proximity to flowers so for a lot of the ceremony I just needed to sneeze.”

James Corden nearly interrupted the royal wedding

The 39-year-old then mimicked how he was trying to suppress his sneezes as the couple said their vows, making the audience laugh in the process.

He continued: “Right at the point when the Archbishop was saying ‘If anyone knows of any reason that these two should not be married ...’

MORE: Meghan gets the giggles at first event

MORE: Samantha tears into Meghan again

MORE: Royal goodie bags go for $4000

media_camera James Corden nearly had a sneezing fit at the royal wedding. Picture: CBS

“I was thinking ‘please don’t sneeze’, and I had to do one of those internal sneezes.”

After re-enacting what he did, again to much laughter from the audience, he added: “I think I got away with it.”

Corden explained to viewers how he has known Prince Harry for around seven years and how the wedding was “wonderful”.

media_camera James Corden and George Clooney at the royal wedding. Picture: Sky News

He said: “It was gorgeous the whole affair, it was happy, it was joyous, it was uplifting.

“It was Britain at it’s finest, a picture perfect day, Windsor Castle, six hundred guests, 30,000 flowers or as Elton John calls it, a Thursday.

media_camera James Corden and his wife, Julia, mingle at the royal wedding. Picture: SWNS/MEGA

“He was there, he performed some songs in the afternoon which was wonderful.”

The cheeky host then made a joke about fellow guest and Nespresso ambassador, George Clooney.

He said: “George Clooney was there so congratulations Meghan and Harry on your brand new Nespresso machine, I imagine that’s what he got him.”

media_camera James Corden said Harry and Meghan’s wedding was “Britain at its finest”. Picture: Givenchy/MEGA

This story was originally published in The Sun and is reprinted with permission.
title: Royal wedding: James Corden reveals the reason he almost interrupted the royal wedding

meta_data.description: JAMES Corden very nearly caused a scene during the royal wedding, but the talk show host managed to avoid an awkward situation. Just.
meta_data.keywords: royal wedding, right royal stuff-up, royal wedding vows, audience laugh, TALK show, beautiful ceremonies, beautiful flowers, CBS Corporation, Elton John, George Clooney, James Corden, Julia, James Whatling
